articles.description: Tomori joined the Serie A giants in January until the end of the season, with an option for Milan to make the switch permanent for £25million. He said he still does not know why Lampard dropped him.
articles.content:
Chelsea defender Fikayo Tomori has lifted the lid on his loan move to AC Milan, saying being axed by then-manager Frank Lampard felt 'frustrating' and 'personal' given their history.

articles.author: Charlotte Daly
articles.title: Wilfried Zaha used to eat CROISSANTS for dinner after being 'forgotten' by Manchester United - Daily Mail
articles.description: Wilfried Zaha struggled to settle into life away from home and admitted to watching TV by himself and eating croissants for dinner as he dwelled in his on negative thoughts during his time at United.
articles.content:
Wilfried Zaha claims he was 'forgotten about' at Manchester United as he explains how his 'depressing' spell under David Moyes was made worse by not playing.

articles.author: Kieran Jackson
articles.title: Lionel Messi to PSG: Mauricio Pochettino reveals no discussions took place after Barcelona win - Daily Mail
articles.description: With Messi's contract at Barca expiring this year, PSG are the frontrunners for his signature but fellow Argentine Pochettino insists no conversation about his future took place at the Nou Camp.
articles.content:
PSG boss Mauricio Pochettino says no discussions took place with Lionel Messi in the aftermath of the French side's win at Barcelona on Tuesday evening.

articles.author: Daniel Davis
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund 'would rather' let Jadon Sancho leave this summer than Erling Haaland - Daily Mail
articles.description: Haaland, 20, extended his fine scoring form this season with a double in the win at Sevilla, but Dortmund are in a race to qualify for the Champions League again due to their poor league form.
articles.content:
Borussia Dortmund are reportedly more willing to let Jadon Sancho leave the club this summer than team-mate Erling Haaland - but have been dealt a dilemma over the star striker's lofty ambitions.
